chapters.title: Chapter 1:  Tears from Steel
chapters.info: Naeff, p. 57—One of the Asha'man. He has a strong, rectangular face and a lean build. He is very Talented with Air, and helped Aviendha prevent a runaway fire during the bubble of evil. He resigned from the Andoran guards after Gaebril took over. He was among the first of the Asha'man to be bonded by Aes Sedai as a Warder. He currently travels with Flinn and Narishma as the only three Asha'man in Rand's coterie. See also Demasiellin, Nelavaire.
